The food was very creative and really excellent, the best we had in Barcelona.  We did the tasting menu, which gave us a sampling of all of the chef's specialties.  The food all has an Asian and French bent to it but it's hard to pin down exactly what category it belongs to.  One of their specialties, a dish of tuna sashimi with a rich, salty sauce and surprisingly mild wasabi ice cream was a highlight.  We didn't have anything that wasn't top notch.
